Name: Peruvian Elder Sour
Ingredients: 50 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: This tasty sour combines the aromatics of pisco and elderflower in an intriguing variation on the Margarita. Consider smoothing with fresh egg white.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2006 by drinks writer Gary "gaz" Regan
Nutrition: One serving of Peruvian Elder Sour contains 153 calories
